item.title: Gajim in Whonix
item.dc:creator: yirgit
item.description:
A few more related quesstions if possible…

Gajim: comes with OMEMO, unfortunetaly some people only use OTR, I followed https://dev.gajim.org/gajim/gajim-plugins/wikis/OffTheRecordPlugin and https://dev.gajim.org/gajim/gajim-plugins and still not clear about where to download the OTR plugin from and whether it’s compatible with my version (I installed Gajim according to the instructions on Whonix wiki).

CoyIM: I don’t see any docs anymore about it. They site doesn’t come up either. Wasn’t that the recommended IM in Whonix just a while ago? anyway this is really basic. I need something that supports OTR and had group functionality. Edit: I just found this

coyIM using OTRv4? Nope Development
CoyIM still in active development , and mostly latest version will be ported to Debian Buster backport.

irc with the OFTC server that comes as default in Whonix HexChat: nightmare, I tried to register my nickname and verify it, I am taken through google ReCaptcha.

Anyway I think we need something with OTR.
